column5: Hey guys,  I was just wondering if anyone on here has fished near matachewan?  Is it any good,,  what can I expect to catch?
PM me with lakes you are going to try and I'll give you my best info. I grew up in Kirkland Lake and we had a camp in Matachewan. T.J. may also have some great input on the area.
Pickereye, bass and Pike... family stayed at Golden Eagle a few years ago... jig n worm outfished everything else we threw at them... HH
Anyone fish Mistinikon Lake or the Montreal River in the Matatchewan area??
Yup! Stayed at Horseshoe Island camp for a week, about 15 years ago... HH
Yea me too, 6 or 7 years ago for three years in a row. A few different reasons why we stoped going; but nothing to do with the fishing, it was decent for numbers. PM sent.
